issue.title: How can i connect cpp files to srcsim simulation?

content.raw: In the first of the 11 tutorials- http://wiki.ros.org/ROS/Tutorials/InstallingandConfiguringROSEnvironment it talks about creating your workspace.  That is where you want to put and build your code.  You want to create and build your code in your home directory (something like /home/miroslav/catkin_ws/src/beginner_tutorials) rather than /srcsim
